question: Which organisation recently commissioned the first phase of the Real-time Train Information System for Indian Railways?
explanation:
The state-owned aerospace and arms manufacturing company and a leading Public Sector Undertaking, Bharat Electronics Ltd has recently commissioned the first phase of the real time train information system (RTIS) for Indian Railways.
RTIS provides a real-time information about the position of locomotives to the Railways. The train controllers can track the location and speed of the RTIS-enabled locomotives and trains. With the technical guidance of Space Applications Centre of ISRO, the system has been built through the Centre for Railway Information System (CRIS).
